units.name: bbgames.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Removes old ball games from /home/{{deploy_user}}/bb_games/

[Service]
Type=simple
ExecStart=/usr/bin/sh -c 'if [ -e /home/{{deploy_user}}/bb_games/* ];then find /home/{{deploy_user}}/bb_games/* -mtime +0 -delete;fi'

units.name: bbgames.timer
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Run bbgames.service every day

[Timer]
OnCalendar=daily
Persistent=true

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
